item.title: Dds spec, please help
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

no just a sec ill complete it

EDIT: use the key above
search public void hally() {

[code] public void DdsSpecial()
{
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####)
{
setAnimation(xxxx);
actionTimer = 0;//3
SpecDamgNPC(yy);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 0;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(yy);
SpecialDelay -= 0; //3
}
else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####)
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

		SpecDamg(yy);
		DDS2Damg = true;
		DDStimer = 1;
		startAnimation(xxxx);
		actionTimer = 0;//4
		teleportToX = absX;
		teleportToY = absY;
		SpecialDelay -= 0;//3
	}
}[/code]

that will be your attack and spec delay timer and damage
now search if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] ==
and under all of that add if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && specialAmount <= 24) { // dds specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && specialAmount >= 25) { // dds DdsSpecial(); specialAmount -= 50; }
that is your spec amount
now search public int GetWepAnim() {
and add this right under it if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { // dds if (FightType == 3) // slash { return 451; } } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { // dds if (FightType == 3) // slash { return 451; } } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) // dds { return 451; }
that is your attack type
and search if (usingSpecial == true) {
and under that add if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && specialAmount >= 50) { ProjectileSpec(252, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); ProjectileSpec(252, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); DdsSpecial(); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(attacknpc); usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }

that was basicly my tut just edited a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Dds spec, please help
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

only client.java ill put a small snipet in and show you
EDIT:say you had this

[code]] public void ClawsSpecial()
{
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####)
{
setAnimation(xxxx);
actionTimer = 0;//3
SpecDamgNPC(yy);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 0;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(59);
SpecialDelay -= 0; //3
}
else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####)
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

		SpecDamg(yy);
		DDS2Damg = true;
		DDStimer = 1;
		startAnimation(xxxx);
		actionTimer = 0;//4
		teleportToX = absX;
		teleportToY = absY;
		SpecialDelay -= 0;//3
	}
}[/code]

change “####” to your model id
change “yy” to your max spec damage
channg “xxxx” to the animation id (the spec gfx)
that would be what i call a mini tut

Read full topic
